description:
It's not everyday you find a true dual living property with two very distinct and separate houses on one 8,525m2 block with subdivision potential (subject to council approval) ... Well your search is over...

Located in a quiet, picturesque cul-de-sac. Surrounded by beautifully maintained properties, this unique opportunity allows you to truly experience the lifestyle and tranquility that acreage living has to offer.

Built, loved and cared for by the sellers this is the first time this superb horse friendly property has come to the market in 28 years. Presenting a huge opportunity for a new family, to call it home. Those wishing to work from home, who require dual living for extended family, who have horses or purely want space surrounded by nature will find this property simply perfect in every way!


Property Features:

36B - Main Residence:
 Built in 1995
 Setback from the road
 Private, Single level home
 4 spacious bedrooms with built in robes and ceiling fans
 The spacious Master bedroom opens out onto the under cover entertaining area whilst being complete with air conditioning, stunning ensuite with double stone top vanity, tiled to the ceiling, double shower head and walk in robe
 Stylishly renovated 3-way family bathroom with 2 vanities so all spaces can operate individually, tiled to the ceiling and beautiful freestanding bath
 The timeless timber kitchen sits perfectly in the centre of the home boasting a fantastic breakfast bar, semi integrated dishwasher and stainless steel appliances
 The large formal lounge and dining room is the perfect spot to enjoy the peaceful country outlook all whilst in the comfort of your own fireplace in the cool winter months
 The beautiful timber flooring flows through the open plan family room that flows effortlessly off the kitchen
 The entire family will enjoy the outdoor, undercover entertaining area that wraps around half of the home and extends out onto a more casual setting - making it the perfect place to relax whilst entertaining your guests
 Perfect for families of all ages offering plenty of space for the kids and pets to run around
 Separate laundry
 DLUG with internal and external access
 Separate driveway to 36A
 Shed 6mx6m

36A - Second Residence:
 Built in 2010
 Single level home
 3 spacious bedrooms with built in robes and ceiling fans + office or 4th bedroom
 The Master bedroom is complete with walk in robe and ensuite
 Modern main bathroom
 Open plan lounge and dining room with vinyl timber look flooring opens out onto the sun drenched front porch - making for the perfect spot for your morning coffee!
 The functional kitchen opens out onto the living area and is complete with gas cooking, stainless steel appliances and breakfast bar
 The rear, paved entertaining area offers a second outdoor space to choose from when entertaining guests
 Air conditioning
 Ceiling fans throughout
 Spacious laundry with plenty of bench space
 Low maintenance gardens
 Separate driveway to 36B
 DLUG with internal and external access + side access to the backyard

Other Features:
 Subdivision potential subject to council approval
 Town Water


In summary, the scene has been set and it is clear that just about every box is well and truly ticked. Homes with so much to offer, in this exceptionally friendly community are hard to find, let alone 2 on the one block! So do yourself a favor and make sure this retreat is at the very top of your list.

Bonogin is located just minutes drive from the Pacific Motorway and is an easy commute to the Brisbane CBD and international airport. To the south, the NSW border is within easy reach, passing the Gold Coast International and domestic airports.

The bustling Robina Town Centre is approximately 15mins drive from your doorstep and provides all the facilities you could possibly require.

With Queensland's finest schools (both public and private), beaches, shops, transport and medical facilities all within minutes drive.

Don't let this opportunity slip through your fingers! Potential is something highly sort after in the current market and these properties certainly ticks those boxes.

Please feel free to contact me should you have any further questions or wish to schedule a private inspection.
